Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes

Class TemporalMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme.scene.Geometry
        • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes.TemporalMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.anim.util.HasLocalTransform, com.jme.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme.collision.Collidable, com.jme.export.Savable, com.jme.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CurvesTemporalMesh
    public class TemporalMesh
extends com.jme.scene.Geometry
    The class extends Geometry so that it can be temporalily added to the object's node. Later each such node's child will be transformed into a list of geometries.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

        blenderContext - the blender context
        Throws:

        Parameters:
        meshStructure - the mesh structure
        blenderContext - the blender context
        loadData - tells if the data should be loaded from the mesh structure
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with file reading occur

      • isBoundary

        public boolean isBoundary​(Edge edge)
        Tells if the given edge is a boundary edge. The boundary edge means that it belongs to a single face or to none.
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge of the mesh
        Returns:
        true if the edge is a boundary one and false otherwise

      • isBoundary

        public boolean isBoundary​(java.lang.Integer index)
        The method tells if the given index is a boundary index. A boundary index belongs to at least one boundary edge.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the mesh
        Returns:
        true if the index is a boundary one and false otherwise

      • rebuildIndexesMappings

        public void rebuildIndexesMappings()
        The method rebuilds the mappings between faces and edges. Should be called after every major change of the temporal mesh done outside it.

        Note: I will remove this method soon and cause the mappings to be done automatically when the mesh is modified.
